verses.text: I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee with my whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: before the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* will I sing \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* unto thee.

I will \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* toward thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* and for thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: for thou hast \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* thy \w word|strong="H0565"\w* above all thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* thou \w answeredst|strong="H6030"\w* me, \add and\add* \w strengthenedst|strong="H7292"\w* me \add with\add* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* in my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

All the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when they \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

Yea, they shall \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Though the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*, yet hath he \w respect|strong="H7200"\w* unto the \w lowly|strong="H8217"\w*: but the \w proud|strong="H1364"\w* he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* afar \w off|strong="H4801"\w*.

Though I \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, thou wilt \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* me: thou shalt stretch \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w perfect|strong="H1584"\w* \add that which\add* concerneth me: thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w forsake|strong="H7503"\w* not the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of thine own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.
